channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Monday Q&A for members
item.description: Good morning RagingBull family! Jeff Bishop here. I know Jason has been messaging you, but Iâ€™m taking over today and hereâ€™s why: Iâ€™m receiving questions from members. Questions specific to the agendas of Jason Bond and myself in our new and highest-tier program, Black Label. Many are interested in a few specific topicsâ€¦ Allow me [â€¦]

item.title: Oil extends strong start to 2025 on signs of strong demand for Mideast crude
item.description: Oil futures rose Monday, looking to build on recent strength that saw crude end at nearly three-month highs last week, boosted by hopes around further stimulus from China and signs of strong demand for Middle Eastern crude.

item.title: Amazon's Ring announces smart smoke alarm as CES tech palooza kicks off
item.description: Kidde and Ring will launch two models in April, along with a $5-per-month smoke monitoring subscription service.

item.title: Europe stocks pare gains, autos cool as Trump denies tariff report; Chip stocks climb
item.description: European markets were higher on Monday, driven by technology and automotive stocks.

item.title: Nvidiaâ€™s stock heads for record close as AI chip trade reloads for fresh run higher
item.description: Foxconn earnings offer upbeat signs about the Blackwell ramp, and Nvidia CEO Jensen Huangâ€™s upcoming CEO keynote could further support the semiconductor sector.

item.title: Lucid reports record quarterly vehicle deliveries, meets production target
item.description: Lucid Group on Monday reported record quarterly vehicle deliveries for the fourth quarter and confirmed production of more than 9,000 vehicles in 2024.

item.title: Trump lawyers seek to block sentencing in New York hush money case with appeal
item.description: A New York judge last week rejected a request by President-elect Trump to dismiss a case where he was found guilty of falsifying business records.

item.title: Takeovers, drones and reverse splits to kick off the New Year

item.title: GrabAGun names Donald Trump Jr. as adviser in bid to lift stock-listing visibility
item.description: GrabAGun on Monday named Donald J. Trump Jr. an adviser and announced he will be an equity shareholder once the online gun retailer goes public in the coming months to become the latest stock with direct involvement from the Trump family.

item.title: Trump lawyers seek to block sentencing in New York hush money case with appeal
item.description: A New York judge last week rejected a request by President-elect Trump to dismiss a case where he was found guilty of falsifying business records.

item.title: Dow rises more than 200 points, Nvidia leads chip stocks higher: Live updates
item.description: Chip stocks led the broader market gains after Foxconn announced record fourth-quarter revenue.

item.title: These government workers will benefit after Biden signs new Social Security law
item.description: President Joe Biden signed a bill on Sunday that will repeal two laws previously preventing many public employees from receiving Social Security benefits.

item.title: Trump reportedly considering important alteration to tariff plans
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is considering a plan that still would apply tariffs to all nations but narrow the impact.

item.title: Global chip stocks climb as Foxconn's bumper results show a continuation of the AI boom
item.description: Global semiconductor stocks climbed on Monday after Foxconn posted record fourth-quarter revenue, suggesting the AI boom has far more room to run.

item.title: Unlocking the Potential of Mesoblast Ltd. (MESO): A Biotech Giant on the Rise
item.description: As a seasoned investor, Iâ€™m always on the lookout for companies that have what it takes to make a significant impact in their respective industries. One such company is Mesoblast Ltd., a biopharmaceutical firm thatâ€™s been making waves with its innovative mesenchymal lineage adult stem cell technology platform. item.title: Bond yields edge higher on reports of Trump tariff plans
item.description: Yields on U.S. government debt were edging up Monday morning as traders focused on reports relating to incoming-President Donald Trumpâ€™s approach to applying tariffs.

item.title: Trump's election certification set to begin on anniversary of 2021 Capitol riot
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump won the 2024 election against Vice President Kamala Harris, who will preside over Congress as it certifies the results.

item.title: Disney to combine its Hulu+ Live TV with streamer Fubo
item.description: Both Hulu+ Live TV and Fubo are streaming services that mimic the traditional cable TV bundle, offering linear TV networks.
